elesama ohu ta aramunak thibuni.hari ho waradi wewa ohu siya aramuna wenuwen peni sitiyeya.gini gahana awwe thara pare wadi wi apata ahimi wannata yana uuwa wellassa wenuwen gayana karannata ohuta shakthiya thibuni.ada ape parapure atham gayakayangeth gayikawangeth lokuma aramuna ringin tonswalata githa wikuna ganimath,chat showala mulata siya githaya dama ganimathya.owunta pamanak nowe athithaye wisu atham gayaka gayikawantada uthum aramunak thibune natha.eheth kapugeta aramunak thibuni.ohu laga asamana manushyathwayak thibuni.rathna shri wijesinhayan ee manushyathwaya gana kiwe soduru gunen kawiyakatath asamana-mithuru,numbaaya ma isa pita sadapana yanuweni.
